participant_1.background:
I'm not married, but I'm very close with my nieces and nephews.
I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.
I like to go to tailgate parties with my friends and listen to Jacob Sartorius.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
My first purchase was a journal that I would fill with my thoughts and reflections.

participant_2.background:
I drive my car to work at an insurance firm.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks! What are your plans for the weekend?
Not much, just hanging out. I have to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy, tomorrow.
Oh no, I'm so sorry. I know how hard that is.
Thanks. I'm going to miss him a lot. He always makes me laugh.
Yeah, dogs are the best. What's your favorite thing about him?
His sense of humor. He's always making me laugh.
That's so sweet. I'm sure you'll both be in each other's hearts forever.
What do you do for work?
I'm an insurance agent at a firm in town.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, listen to music, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like to do all of those things too.
That's great! We should hang out sometime.
